myoconverter.convert_steps.O2MStep4¶

Created on Sat May 14 21:27:00 2022

mapping site side location and muscle parameters from one side muscle to the other side.

Assume the bone geometry and muscle paths are already converted and identical from one side to the other.

@author: hwang
